title: Tearmoon Empire: Collection Of Short Stories
alternative_title: ティアムーン帝国物語短編集@COMIC; Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari Tanhenshū@ Comic
status: ティアムーン帝国物語短編集@COMIC; Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari Tanhenshū@ Comic
description:
Description :
        A collection of stories of tragedy and joy told from the perspective of Mia and those around her, from other the original and current timelines.Manga adaption of the collection of short stories side volume of the light novel.
